text: Kouakou Hervé Koffi (born 16 October 1996) is a Burkinabe professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Belgian club Royal Excel Mouscron on loan from Lille and the Burkina Faso national football team. ==Club career== Koffi joined ASEC Mimosas of Abidjan in November 2015. On 21 June 2017, Koffi joined Lille OSC on a five-year deal. Koffi made his debut for Lille in a 2–0 Ligue 1 loss to Caen on 20 August 2017. ==International career== In 2015, he represented Burkina Faso at the African Games football tournament. In 2017, he represented Burkina Faso in the Africa Cup of Nations. ==Personal life== He is the son of former Burkinabe international footballer Hyacinthe Koffi who played in the 2000 African Cup of Nations qualification campaign. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bobo-Dioulasso Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Burkinabé footballers Category:Burkina Faso international footballers Category:ASF Bobo Dioulasso players Category:ASEC Mimosas players Category:Lille OSC players Category:Belenenses SAD players Category:Ligue 1 players Category:Burkinabé expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in France Category:Burkinabé expatriate sportspeople in France Category:African Games silver medalists for Burkina Faso Category:African Games medalists in football Category:Competitors at the 2015 African Games
